DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a brief intervention delivered to emergency department patients increases the uptake of rapid HIV and hepatitis C testing in comparison to no brief intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Viral Testing in the Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: Emergency department patient. Does not know HIV or hepatitis C status. Has an ASSIST V3 score that indicates recent illicit and/or prescription drug use. Fluency in English or Spanish. Critically ill or injured. Homicidal and/or suicidal intention. Age < 18 years or > 64 years. Does not speak English or Spanish.
